long_description: The outdoor-inspired Lowepro Dashpoint 30 camera case is a colorful and protective pouch for your CSC (compact system camera) with attached zoom lens or other sensitive electronic devices. Wide-mouth opening with reverse zippers offers easy access to gear. Built-in memory card pocket supplies a convenient place to stash spare memory-right inside top lid. Durable EVA padding provides protective, impact-resistant construction. Versatile attachment with vertical webbing, horizontal flaps and rip-and-stick fasteners secures the pouch to most attachment points such as loops, straps and daisy chains. Lowepro Dashpoint 30 camera case comes with a removable, adjustable shoulder strap that features rotating snaphooks for a comfortable carrying option. Internal dimensions measure 4.8 x 3.9 x 3.5 in.
short_description: The outdoor-inspired Lowepro Dashpoint 30 camera case is a colorful and protective pouch for your CSC (compact system camera) with attached zoom lens or other sensitive electronic devices.
